Articles.Content:
they are super cool i play now space engineer but i purchased kerbal space program but not receive the key as i will call teh ebay now. 

I will try to contact the seller asap by the way do you know any designing program like siemens nx as theyre is hard to create moons, space station in the best way as i do not how to draft a circle there.

the seller is annoying does not send the steam key wants to have steam key and join you with my own creations but the seller does not respond if he does not respons more i will try to purchsae from another or anyway enjoy the space engineer as it is same great game but i could not register to their forum as they did not send the link registration .

Much love :> 

Waiting for any support. 

Again watch this and Its great as I wil ltry to purchase kerbal spae program at any way. Fortunately I received the key for the kerbal space program so I will play and create my own projects after 19:15 as now I cant install steam. AS a workaholic, being resourceful and hopefully in the future be entrepreneur(using delegation mode) I joined the French space forum as well and already had thougths about joining other forums I mean Norwegian, german, Japanese and others.

Still waiting for the receival of the rocket in 2-4 days ordered from ebay so I will make the first steps to be like elon musk even though I will try to record it and publish on youtube. [I have already channel there but there is no any space and rocket development[

 

Keep the things together.

Edited December 17, 2019 by michaelbezos1
add more info/adding more info

[self snip]

Meanwhile, your question has been moved to its own thread. 

 

Edited December 24, 2019 by Vanamonde

43 minutes ago, Vanamonde said:

@michaelbezos1, are you saying that you bought KSP from someone on Ebay? If so, that was an illegal sale. 

Meanwhile, your question has been moved to its own thread. 

Illegal implies against the law or rules. The high court of justice in europe has deemed that any software (owner) has the right to be resold. And this right cannot and shall not be limited in anyway or shape - independent of where the company is located, so long as it is being sold to a european customer the seller may not put any limitations are hurdles. Please do not spread inaccuracies and false statements, especially from a semi official ranking as "moderator".

 

(If need be I can show the court ruling, it's dry text though).

he refundedme anyway as i did not receive the key on time anyway i bought normal version 

Much love :> 

Keep going

Edited December 19, 2019 by michaelbezos1
adding info
My mistake. I assumed people using Ebay would be Americans, for some reason.
Hi @michaelbezos1 - You need to contact ebay's custumer support and let them know about this issue, they might be able to help you.
